verses.verse: Then all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> gathered <S%H6908><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> at Hebron <S%H2275><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we are your bone <S%H6106><s%> and your flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

"In times <S%H1571><s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H8543><s%> past, <S%H8543><s%> <S%H8032><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> when Saul <S%H7586><s%> was king, <S%H4428><s%> you [were] the one who led <S%H3318><s%> out and brought <S%H935><s%> in Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to you, 'You shall shepherd <S%H7462><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and you shall be prince <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> My people <S%H5971><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>'"

So all <S%H3605><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> at Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with them in Hebron <S%H2275><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> and they anointed <S%H4886><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Samuel. <S%H8050><s%>

Then David <S%H1732><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> (that is, Jebus <S%H2982><s%>); and the Jebusites, <S%H2983><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> [were] there. <S%H8033><s%>

And the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jebus <S%H2982><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> "You shall not enter <S%H935><s%> here. <S%H2008><s%>" Nevertheless David <S%H1732><s%> captured <S%H3920><s%> the stronghold <S%H4686><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> (that is, the city <S%H5892><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>).

Now David <S%H1732><s%> had said, <S%H559><s%> "Whoever <S%H3605><s%> strikes <S%H5221><s%> down <S%H5221><s%> a Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> first <S%H7223><s%> shall be chief <S%H7218><s%> and commander. <S%H8269><s%>" And Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up first, <S%H7223><s%> so he became <S%H1961><s%> chief. <S%H7218><s%>
Then David <S%H1732><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the stronghold; <S%H4679><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> it was called <S%H7121><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>

And he built <S%H1129><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> all <S%H5439><s%> around, <S%H5439><s%> from the Millo <S%H4407><s%> even to the surrounding <S%H5439><s%> area; <S%H5439><s%> and Joab <S%H3097><s%> repaired <S%H2421><s%> the rest <S%H7605><s%> of the city. <S%H5892><s%>
And David <S%H1732><s%> became <S%H1980><s%> greater <S%H1980><s%> and greater, <S%H1419><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> [was] with him.

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> had, who gave <S%H2388><s%> him strong <S%H2388><s%> support <S%H2388><s%> in his kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> together <S%H5973><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to make <S%H4427><s%> him king, <S%H4427><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And these <S%H428><s%> [constitute] the list <S%H4557><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> had: Jashobeam, <S%H3434><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a Hachmonite, <S%H2453><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%> of the thirty; <S%H7970><s%> he lifted <S%H5782><s%> up his spear <S%H2595><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> whom he killed <S%H2491><s%> at one <S%H259><s%> time. <S%H6471><s%>

And after <S%H310><s%> him was Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo, <S%H1734><s%> the Ahohite, <S%H266><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> [was] one of the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men. <S%H1368><s%>

He was with David <S%H1732><s%> at Pasdammim <S%H6450><s%> when the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> together there <S%H8033><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> and there was a plot <S%H2513><s%> of ground <S%H7704><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of barley; <S%H8184><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the Philistines. <S%H6430><s%>

And they took <S%H3320><s%> their stand <S%H3320><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the plot, <S%H2513><s%> and defended <S%H5337><s%> it, and struck <S%H5221><s%> down <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> them by a great <S%H1419><s%> victory. <S%H8668><s%>

Now three <S%H7969><s%> of the thirty <S%H7970><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> men <S%H7218><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the rock <S%H6697><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> into the cave <S%H4631><s%> of Adullam, <S%H5725><s%> while the army <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> was camping <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Rephaim. <S%H7497><s%>
And David <S%H1732><s%> was then <S%H227><s%> in the stronghold, <S%H4686><s%> while the garrison <S%H5333><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> [was] then <S%H227><s%> in Bethlehem. <S%H1035><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> had <S%H183><s%> a craving <S%H183><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Oh <S%H4310><s%> that someone <S%H4310><s%> would give <S%H8248><s%> me water <S%H4325><s%> to drink <S%H8248><s%> from the well <S%H953><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%H1035><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by the gate! <S%H8179><s%>"

So the three <S%H7969><s%> broke <S%H1234><s%> through <S%H1234><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and drew <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from the well <S%H953><s%> of Bethlehem <S%H1035><s%> which <S%H834><s%> [was] by the gate, <S%H8179><s%> and took <S%H5375><s%> [it] and brought <S%H935><s%> [it] to David; <S%H1732><s%> nevertheless David <S%H1732><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> it, but poured <S%H5258><s%> it out to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%>

and he said, <S%H559><s%> "Be it far <S%H2486><s%> from me before <S%H4480><s%> my God <S%H430><s%> that I should do <S%H6213><s%> this. <S%H2088><s%> Shall I drink <S%H8354><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> men <S%H376><s%> [who went] at the risk of their lives <S%H5315><s%>? For at the risk of their lives <S%H5315><s%> they brought <S%H935><s%> it." Therefore he would <S%H14><s%> not drink <S%H8354><s%> it. These <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> did. <S%H6213><s%>

As for Abshai <S%H52><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab, <S%H3097><s%> he was chief <S%H7218><s%> of the thirty, <S%H7970><s%> and he swung <S%H5782><s%> his spear <S%H2595><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and killed <S%H2491><s%> them; and he had a name <S%H8034><s%> as well as the thirty. <S%H7970><s%>

Of the three <S%H7969><s%> in the second <S%H8147><s%> [rank] he was the most honored, <S%H3513><s%> and became <S%H1961><s%> their commander; <S%H8269><s%> however, he did not attain <S%H935><s%> to the [first] three. <S%H7969><s%>

Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada, <S%H3077><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of a valiant <S%H2428><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of Kabzeel, <S%H6909><s%> mighty <S%H7227><s%> in deeds, <S%H6467><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> down <S%H5221><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> [sons of] Ariel <S%H739><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%> He also went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> and killed <S%H5221><s%> a lion <S%H738><s%> inside <S%H8432><s%> a pit <S%H953><s%> on a snowy <S%H7950><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And he killed <S%H5221><s%> an Egyptian, <S%H4713><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of [great] stature <S%H4060><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> tall. Now in the Egyptian's hand <S%H3027><s%> [was] a spear <S%H2595><s%> like a weaver's beam, <S%H4500><s%> but he went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to him with a club <S%H7626><s%> and snatched <S%H1497><s%> the spear <S%H2595><s%> from the Egyptian's hand, <S%H3027><s%> and killed <S%H2026><s%> him with his own spear. <S%H2595><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> [things] Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> did, <S%H6213><s%> and had a name <S%H8034><s%> as well as the three <S%H7969><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> men. <S%H1368><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> he was honored <S%H3513><s%> among <S%H4480><s%> the thirty, <S%H7970><s%> but he did not attain <S%H935><s%> to the three; <S%H7969><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> appointed <S%H7760><s%> him over <S%H5921><s%> his guard. <S%H4928><s%>

Now the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of the armies <S%H2428><s%> [were] Asahel <S%H6214><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Joab, <S%H3097><s%> Elhanan <S%H445><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Dodo <S%H1734><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%H1035><s%>
Shammoth <S%H8054><s%> the Harorite, <S%H2033><s%> Helez <S%H2503><s%> the Pelonite, <S%H6397><s%>
Ira <S%H5896><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ikkesh <S%H6142><s%> the Tekoite, <S%H8621><s%> Abiezer <S%H44><s%> the Anathothite, <S%H6069><s%>
Sibbecai <S%H5444><s%> the Hushathite, <S%H2843><s%> Ilai <S%H5866><s%> the Ahohite, <S%H266><s%>
Maharai <S%H4121><s%> the Netophathite, <S%H5200><s%> Heled <S%H2466><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baanah <S%H1196><s%> the Netophathite, <S%H5200><s%>
Ithai <S%H863><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ribai <S%H7380><s%> of Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> the Pirathonite, <S%H6553><s%>
Hurai <S%H2360><s%> of the brooks <S%H5158><s%> of Gaash, <S%H1608><s%> Abiel <S%H22><s%> the Arbathite, <S%H6164><s%>
Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%> the Baharumite, <S%H978><s%> Eliahba <S%H455><s%> the Shaalbonite, <S%H8170><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hashem <S%H2044><s%> the Gizonite, <S%H1493><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shagee <S%H7681><s%> the Hararite, <S%H2043><s%>
Ahiam <S%H279><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Sacar <S%H7940><s%> the Hararite, <S%H2043><s%> Eliphal <S%H465><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ur, <S%H9003><s%>
Hepher <S%H2660><s%> the Mecherathite, <S%H4382><s%> Ahijah <S%H281><s%> the Pelonite, <S%H6397><s%>
Hezro <S%H2695><s%> the Carmelite, Naarai <S%H5293><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ezbai, <S%H229><s%>
Joel <S%H3100><s%> the brother <S%H251><s%> of Nathan, <S%H5416><s%> Mibhar <S%H4006><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hagri, <S%H1905><s%>

Zelek <S%H6768><s%> the Ammonite, <S%H5984><s%> Naharai <S%H5171><s%> the Berothite, <S%H1307><s%> the armor <S%H3627><s%> bearer <S%H5375><s%> of Joab <S%H3097><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah, <S%H6870><s%>
Ira <S%H5896><s%> the Ithrite, <S%H3505><s%> Gareb <S%H1619><s%> the Ithrite, <S%H3505><s%>
Uriah <S%H223><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> Zabad <S%H2066><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahlai, <S%H304><s%>
Adina <S%H5721><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shiza <S%H7877><s%> the Reubenite, <S%H7206><s%> a chief <S%H7218><s%> of the Reubenites, <S%H7206><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> with him,
Hanan <S%H2605><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maacah <S%H4601><s%> and Joshaphat <S%H3092><s%> the Mithnite, <S%H4981><s%>
Uzzia <S%H5814><s%> the Ashterathite, <S%H6254><s%> Shama <S%H8091><s%> and Jeiel <S%H3262><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hotham <S%H2369><s%> the Aroerite, <S%H6200><s%>

Eliel <S%H447><s%> the Mahavite <S%H4233><s%> and Jeribai <S%H3403><s%> and Joshaviah, <S%H3145><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elnaam, <S%H493><s%> and Ithmah <S%H3495><s%> the Moabite, <S%H4125><s%>
